document.full_text: a single 9-inch-long brown hair found in the car trunk of accused child killer casey anthony could have been ripped from the dead body of her 2-year old daughter, an fbi expert testified on saturday.
document.title: hair in casey anthony's trunk may be caylee's: expert
lines_and_colors: a single 9-inch-long brown hair found in the car trunk of accused child killer casey anthony could have been ripped from the dead body of her 2-year old daughter, an fbi expert testified on saturday.
